Bomb.NAME: All-Out Attack
Bomb.DESCRIPTION: All Parus perform their current intent once. NL Consume.
Bomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All Parus perform their current intent once. NL Consume.

Virus.NAME: Virus
Virus.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, the leftmost card in hand becomes a copy of this card.
Virus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, the card to the right of this card in hand becomes a copy of this card.

PalAnger.NAME: Palu's Wrath
PalAnger.DESCRIPTION: All Parus deal double damage this turn. NL Consume.

Encourage.NAME: Encourage
Encourage.DESCRIPTION: Give all Parus +3 Strength and +15 Armor. NL Consume.
Encourage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give all Parus +5 Strength and +25 Armor. NL Consume.

Pills.NAME: 高级药剂
Pills.DESCRIPTION: clear 目标pal's 身上的所有 debuffs  NL 消耗

Full_Protect.NAME: Full_Protect
Full_Protect.DESCRIPTION: 将自己护甲全部给予这个帕鲁，然后其获得 !M! 层残影
Full_Protect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 将自己护甲全部给予这个帕鲁，然后其获得 !M! 层残影

Rocket_Bomb.NAME: 火箭弹
Rocket_Bomb.DESCRIPTION: 将帕鲁发射出去，对所有敌人造成等同于其血量的伤害，然后其死亡

Cancel.NAME: Aim
Cancel.DESCRIPTION: Parus will prioritize attacking this enemy.

PokeBall.NAME: Paru Ball
PokeBall.DESCRIPTION: Capture monsters below 20% health. NL Void. NL Consume.

PokeGOGO.NAME: Go Fight!
PokeGOGO.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Paru. NL Void. NL Consume.
